parameters.definition: Observed y values at each data point k
Observed x values at each data point k

description: A quantity y is known to depend on another quantity x. A set of corresponding values has been collected for x and y and is presented. Fit the ‘best’ quadratic curve y = c * x^2 + b * x + a to this set of data points. The objective is to minimize the sum of absolute deviations of each observed value of y from the value predicted by the quadratic relationship.
